root.title: u. meat group file trade complaint
root.body: american meat institut ame say intend ask u. govern retali european commun meat inspect requir ame presid c manli molpu also say industri would file petit challeng korea ban u. meat product molpu told senat agricultur subcommitte ame livestock farm group intend file petit section 301 gener agreement tariff trade ec direct effect april 30 requir u. meat process plant compli fulli ec standard
